snippet.title: Skylar & Plux: Adventure on Clover Island - Release Date Trailer [PC, PS4, Xbox One]
snippet.description:
Buckle up! Skylar & Plux: Adventure on Clover Island is set to launch on PC, Xbox One and PlayStation®4 on May 19th, 2017 priced at $14.99 / €14.99! 

Skylar & Plux: Adventure on Clover Island is a vibrant 3D platformer, a homage to the beloved platformer genre of the previous decade. Explore the island with the freedom-boosting Jet Pack, and uncover its mysterious past with the puzzling Time Orb. Are CRT’s turret bots giving you trouble? Grab their missiles and send them back, turn their gatling fire against them and send his minions flying with the powerful Magnetic Glove.

Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/452540/
Official website: http://adventureoncloverisland.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/skylarandplux
Twitter: https://twitter.com/skylarandplux

Grip Digital website: http://www.grip-digital.com/
Grip Digital Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Grip-Digital...
Grip Digital Twitter: https://twitter.com/grip_digital
